overview: As General Manager at Radiant Imaging since March 2007, Mr. Bob Van Meter is responsible for the planning, specification and oversight of Hardware Engineering, Product Development, and Production functions. He is also leading the companyâ€™s on-going Quality Improvement processes. Prior to joining Radiant Imaging, Mr. Van Meter was General Manager at Electrical Geodesics, a medical device company, with management responsibility for the Production, Customer Support, and Engineering Departments during a period of very rapid growth; he was also responsible for the design, implementation and approval of their ISO, FDA and CE compliant quality system. In addition, Mr. Van Meter has extensive Project Management experience from working with Intel, General Electric, and Westinghouse. Having owned and operated his own distribution business, Mr. Van Meter is deeply familiar with maintaining top quality products and strong customer relations while delivering on or ahead of schedule.
